attributes.action: People are fed up of being ignored on immigration
attributes.additional_details: Deport immigrants who come illegally back to france, and Never be granted asylum.
attributes.background: Stop talking and start deporting back to france

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for a similar action: 

Deport all immigrants that arrive illegally from safe countries
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703195
